price: Tidaklah mungkin bagi matahari mendapatkan bulan dan malam pun tidak dapat mendahului siang.  Dan masing-masing beredar pada garis edarnya.
arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَكُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā al-shamsu yanbaghī lahā an tud'rika al-qamara walā al-laylu sābiqu al-nahāri wakullun fī falakin yasbaḥūna
